metadata.description: Sage Protocol plugin marketplace for Claude Code

plugins.name: build-web3
plugins.description: Build Web3 dApps and smart contracts from scratch through shipping. Full lifecycle for EVM/Base development with Solidity, Foundry, Next.js, and viem/wagmi. Covers contracts, frontend, testing, security analysis, and deployment.

plugins.name: claude-flow
plugins.description: Enterprise AI agent orchestration plugin with 150+ commands, 74+ specialized agents, SPARC methodology, swarm coordination, GitHub integration, and neural training capabilities

plugins.name: sage-protocol-cli
plugins.description: Automate Sage Protocol governance workflows using the CLI. Create DAOs, manage prompts, run governance proposals, create bounties, and participate in permissionless collaboration on prompts.

plugins.name: sage-manager
plugins.description: Sage Protocol plugin with /sage-install, /sage-setup, /sage-list, /sage-update commands. Install skills and prompts from CID, DAO, or GitHub. Dual-CLI backend with MCP integration.

plugins.name: sage-node
plugins.description: Full Sage Protocol Node.js CLI experience. Translates natural language to sage commands with auto-execution. Setup wallet, get tokens, manage libraries, governance, bounties - all through the CLI.

plugins.name: solidity-audit
plugins.description: Use when auditing Solidity/EVM smart contracts, triaging Slither/Semgrep results, building threat models/invariants, or producing an audit report with reproducible evidence. CLI-first with Hound knowledge graphs.
